name: Alameda County Property & Salvage Donations
description: Donated surplus county property including office furniture, equipment, and supplies provided to eligible nonprofit organizations as in-kind donations
fullDescription: Alameda County's General Services Agency donates surplus county property to eligible nonprofit organizations, providing free equipment and supplies that would otherwise be disposed of.
whatTheyOffer:
- Surplus office furniture (desks, chairs, tables)
- Office equipment and electronics
- General supplies
- Availability varies based on county surplus
- Items provided as in-kind donations
howToGetIt:
1. Must be a registered 501(c)(3) nonprofit in Alameda County
2. Contact the Alameda County Property & Salvage division
3. Complete donation request paperwork
4. Browse available surplus items
5. Arrange pickup of approved items
